message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $120 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'd like to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to go up to $140. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm not far off from your target, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50. This is my final offer, so I'd appreciate it if you could consider it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $129.99?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $132.50. This is my last offer, so please let me know if it works for you.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $129.99. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider buying from someone else.
